T02dipguhsu:830: nityaṃ svasamayaḥ sādhyo nityaṃ pūjyās tathāgatāḥ |
T02dipguhsu:831: nityaṃ ca gurave deyaṃ sarvabuddhasamo hy asau || 390
T02dipguhsu:834: adya vaḥ saphalaṃ janma yad asmin supratiṣṭhitāḥ |
T02dipguhsu:835: samāḥ samayadevānāṃ bhavitā stha na saṃśayaḥ || 392
T02dipguhsu:838: adya mārān vinirjitya praviṣṭāḥ paramaṃ puram |
T02dipguhsu:839: prāptam adyaiva buddhatvaṃ bhavadbhir nātra saṃśayaḥ || 394
T02dipguhsu:840: iti kuruta manaḥ prasādavajraṃ svasamayam akṣayasaukhadaṃ bhajadhvam |
T02dipguhsu:841: jagati laghu sukhe 'dya vajrasattvapratisamaśāśvatatām gatā bhavantaḥ ||
T02dipguhsu:844: saty eva saṃbhave teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ vāmapāṇinā |
T02dipguhsu:846: trisaptāhutim ekāṃ vā rājño vā bhūpater atha |
T02dipguhsu:850: saṃgṛhya yat tad utsṛṣṭaṃ saṃtoṣya dattadakṣiṇān |
T02dipguhsu:855: dattvārthine rajaḥ stokaṃ mahat toye rajaḥ sṛjet || 402
T02dipguhsu:856: garttāpūre pratiṣṭhāyāṃ home cakre ca yad dhanam |
T02dipguhsu:857: ācāryasyaiva tat sarvam ity āha varavajradhṛk || 403
T02dipguhsu:861: tābhyāṃ yad racayec cakraṃ cittavākkāyikaṃ matam || 405
T02dipguhsu:866: kāyastobhāc ca khesthānaṃ stobhāveśe vidhis tv ayam |
T02dipguhsu:875: cetasaiva vidhiḥ sarvas taddhīno naiva sidhyati || 412
T02dipguhsu:877: manasokto vidhiḥ śreṣṭho vāṅmātreṇātra kiṃ bhavet || 413
T02dipguhsu:878: vṛttamātrān na buddhatvaṃ śrutamātrāc ca no bhavet |
T02dipguhsu:879: cintayāpi na yāvac ca bhāvanāto nirucyate || 413
T02dipguhsu:884: yat phalaṃ bodhicittaṃ tad buddhajñānam anuttaram |
